    • Method Detail

      • writeReplace

        public Object writeReplace()
                    throws ObjectStreamException
        Description copied from interface: DistributedCollection
        Method used to create an object which will be transferred to a remote place.

        This method is present in interface DistributedCollection to force the implementation in implementing classes. Implementation should return a LazyObjectReference instance capable of initializing the local handle of the implementing class on the remote place

        Specified by:
        writeReplace in interface DistributedCollection<V,DistMap<K,V>>
        Overrides:
        writeReplace in class DistMap<K,V>
        Returns:
        a LazyObjectReference of the implementing class (left to programmer's good-will)
        Throws:
        ObjectStreamException - if such an exception is thrown during the process
